body_html: @ludimagister , not running the test because even the fprop alone is insanely slow compared to my framework (i.e., I do forward only pass and its still an order of magnitude behind). Right now I'm writing a monolithic RNN Op that does the entire RNN sequence (w/ dynamic computation but not dynamic memory) in 1 block.

body: @ludimagister , not running the test because even the fprop alone is insanely slow compared to my framework (i.e., I do forward only pass and its still an order of magnitude behind). Right now I'm writing a monolithic RNN Op that does the entire RNN sequence (w/ dynamic computation but not dynamic memory) in 1 block.
